title: Because a Little Bug Went Ka-CHOO!
description: Follow along as one sneeze turns a town upside down!Just one "KA-CHOO" causes a whole chain of hilarity, from a splashing turtle to a wet hen, to a flying policeman, a sinking boat, and just about everyone crashing a circus parade! Readers young and old will be entertainedby this silly story. So turn the page and find out what could possibly happen next!Originally created by Dr. Seuss himself, Beginner Books are fun, funny, and easy to read. These unjacketed hardcover early readers encourage children to read all on their own, using simple words and illustrations. Smaller than the classic large format Seuss picture books like The Lorax and Oh, The Places Youâ€™ll Go !, these portable packages are perfect for practicing readers ages 3-7, and lucky parents too!
author: Rosetta  Stone
